scripts.setup: echo 'ğŸ”§ Setting up SaaS X-Ray workspace...' && npm install && echo 'ğŸ“¦ Building shared-types...' && cd shared-types && npm install && npm run build && cd ../backend && echo 'ğŸ”— Linking shared-types to backend...' && npm install && npm link @saas-xray/shared-types && cd ../frontend && echo 'ğŸ“± Installing frontend dependencies...' && npm install && echo 'âœ… Workspace setup complete!' && echo 'ğŸ“‹ Next: Start Docker containers if needed: docker compose up -d postgres redis'
scripts.run: echo 'ğŸš€ Starting SaaS X-Ray backend on port' $CONDUCTOR_PORT && cd backend && PORT=$CONDUCTOR_PORT MASTER_ENCRYPTION_KEY='dev-master-encryption-key-with-sufficient-length-for-aes-256-gcm-encryption-2024-secure' DATABASE_URL='postgresql://postgres:password@localhost:5433/saas_xray' REDIS_URL='redis://localhost:6379' npm run dev
scripts.archive: echo 'ğŸ—‚ï¸  Archiving workspace:' $CONDUCTOR_WORKSPACE_NAME && echo 'Workspace archived successfully'

description: SaaS X-Ray - Enterprise Shadow AI Detection Platform. Use for parallel development of AI platform connectors (Gemini, ChatGPT, Claude) and GPT-5 analysis service.
